colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @051A *, ,ZHES PA tU SIDDHIS BRIS PA LAGS SO,, ,,(`AOm SVA STI, RMAD BYUNG LAM SROG MAN NGAG NYAL 'GRO'I RGYUN, ,MDO RGYUD DBANGo PHYUG RAL BA'I KHUR GSE BA NAS, ,NGAN RTOG DUG CHEN BU YI DAG BYED DU, ,'BEBS MKHAS CHOSo RJEo BHA GI RA THAS RGYAL, ,BRJOD BYA'I GZI 'BAR RTZA TSIG DBYIG LDAN MA, ,RGYAS 'GREL MA RGANG ZHUN MA'I GOS GYON 'DIS, ,MKHAS RLOM YIG 'JOG RI SHOG SKAM PA'I TSOGS, ,RLUNG 'KHYER ZOL GYIS MA KHO CHUNG GSHONG 'TSOL SNYAM, ,GANG 'DI'I DPAR GSAR MTSAN MO'I MGON PO GANG, ,SHOG BU'I RDZID BU BYE BAR 'CHAR BA'I BRNYAN, ,PHYOGS LHUNG NAG BRAL MKHAS MANG LUS DKAR GYI, ,RNAM DPYOD MIG GI BDUD RTZIR BSKRUN 'DI RMAD, ,DE SLAD 'DIR RTEN SEMS KYI DON MTHUN GANG, ,MTSAN LDAN GSHES GNYEN DED DPON MNYES PA'I MTHUS, ,NGES DON BLA MA'I GDENGS CAN GTZUG RGYAN MCHOG ,NYAMS MYONG LAG RTZER RNYED PA'I DPAL THOB SHOG , (CES PA'ANG GYI NA ZHIG GIS BRIS SO, ,'DUL KHRIMS GTZANG SRUNG YID DGA' CHOS 'DZIN GLING GI SPAR KHANG DU BZHUGS, ,)
